name: Corneil & Bernie Mayday! FREE
description:
Discover Corneil and Bernie, your two favourite heroes, in their crazy new game on iPhone,iPod and iPad!

Mayday, Mayday! Corneil and Bernie find themselves again in a fix! Stuck in the middle of a river, between aggressive piranhas, they are just waiting for you to get them out of a tight corner!

Will you be skilled enough to get them out of these difficult situations?!

Hit on the piranhas to save Corneil and Bernie!

Watch out for the boss who’re sneaking up next to Corneil and Bernie to attack them!

Collect bonuses to help you in your mission!

Achieve the highest score you can in 30 seconds and become the leader of the Corneil & Bernie’s defenders league!

You can share you score on Facebook or Twitter and challenge all your fiends!

Available in English and French.
